hackathon-description-text: At HackIDC, students from all over Israel will be developing technological products in order to improve student life around the world. We feel that the needs and problems of students nowadays are best addressed by students themselves. The projects will be judged based on creativity, unique technology and contribution to student life, not according to how profitable they might be.
hackathon-eligibility: Since HackIDC is a national student Hackathon, all participants
hackathon-rules:
Please view our terms and conditions 
.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Products at HackIDC will be highly evaluated for their technological base.
Since the theme of HackIDC is "Student Life", the products will judged upon their contirbution to the students community and how it helped making the world a better place.
Innovation and creativity are important factors for HackIDC products.
